# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the function constant.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get }
```

## Reading the function constant’s properties

- **type**: The data type of the function constant.
- **index**: The index of the function constant.
- **required**: A Boolean value indicating whether the function constant needs to be provided to specialize the function.
